verses.verse: In the mean time,<WG1722> <WG3739> when there were gathered together<WG1996> an innumerable multitude<WG3461> of people,<WG3793> insomuch that<WG5620> they trod<WG2662> one upon another,<WG240> he began<WG756> to say<WG3004> unto<WG4314> his<WG848> disciples<WG3101> first of all,<WG4412> Beware <WG4337> ye<WG1438> of<WG575> the<WG3588> leaven<WG2219> of the<WG3588> Pharisees,<WG5330> which<WG3748> is<WG2076> hypocrisy. <WG5272>
For <WG1161> there is<WG2076> nothing<WG3762> covered,<WG4780> that<WG3739> shall not<WG3756> be revealed;<WG601> neither<WG2532> hid,<WG2927> that<WG3739> shall not<WG3756> be known. <WG1097>

Therefore <WG473> <WG3739> whatsoever <WG3745> ye have spoken<WG2036> in<WG1722> darkness<WG4653> shall be heard<WG191> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> light;<WG5457> and<WG2532> that which<WG3739> ye have spoken<WG2980> in<WG4314> the<WG3588> ear<WG3775> in<WG1722> closets<WG5009> shall be proclaimed<WG2784> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> housetops. <WG1430>

And <WG1161> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213> my<WG3450> friends,<WG5384> Be not afraid <WG5399> <WG3361> of <WG575> them that kill<WG615> the<WG3588> body,<WG4983> and<WG2532> after<WG3326> that<WG5023> have<WG2192> no<WG3361> more <WG5100> <WG4055> that they can do. <WG4160>

But <WG1161> I will forewarn<WG5263> you<WG5213> whom<WG5101> ye shall fear: <WG5399> Fear<WG5399> him, which after he hath killed<WG615> hath<WG2192> power<WG1849> to cast<WG1685> into<WG1519> hell;<WG1067> yea,<WG3483> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> Fear<WG5399> him. <WG5126>

Are not<WG3780> five<WG4002> sparrows<WG4765> sold<WG4453> for two<WG1417> farthings,<WG787> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them<WG846> is<WG2076> forgotten<WG1950> before<WG1799> God? <WG2316>

But <WG235> even<WG2532> the<WG3588> very hairs<WG2359> of your<WG5216> head<WG2776> are all<WG3956> numbered.<WG705> Fear<WG5399> not<WG3361> therefore: <WG3767> ye are of more value<WG1308> than many<WG4183> sparrows. <WG4765>

Also <WG1161> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> Whosoever <WG3956> <WG3739> <WG302> shall confess<WG3670> me<WG1698> before<WG1715> men, <WG444> <WG1722> him <WG846> shall the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> also<WG2532> confess<WG3670> before<WG1715> the<WG3588> angels<WG32> of God: <WG2316>
But <WG1161> he that denieth<WG720> me<WG3165> before<WG1799> men<WG444> shall be denied<WG533> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> angels<WG32> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3956> <WG3739> shall speak<WG2046> a word<WG3056> against<WG1519> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man,<WG444> it shall be forgiven<WG863> him: <WG846> but<WG1161> unto him that blasphemeth<WG987> against<WG1519> the<WG3588> Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> it shall not<WG3756> be forgiven. <WG863>

And <WG1161> when<WG3752> they bring<WG4374> you<WG5209> unto<WG1909> the<WG3588> synagogues,<WG4864> and<WG2532> unto magistrates,<WG746> and<WG2532> powers,<WG1849> take ye no thought <WG3309> <WG3361> how <WG4459> or<WG2228> what thing<WG5101> ye shall answer,<WG626> or<WG2228> what<WG5101> ye shall say: <WG2036>
For <WG1063> the<WG3588> Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> shall teach<WG1321> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> same<WG846> hour<WG5610> what<WG3739> ye ought<WG1163> to say. <WG2036>

And <WG1161> one<WG5100> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> company<WG3793> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Master,<WG1320> speak<WG2036> to my<WG3450> brother,<WG80> that he divide<WG3307> the<WG3588> inheritance<WG2817> with<WG3326> me.<WG1700>
And <WG1161> he<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Man, <WG444> who<WG5101> made<WG2525> me<WG3165> a judge<WG1348> or<WG2228> a divider<WG3312> over<WG1909> you? <WG5209>

And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Take heed,<WG3708> and<WG2532> beware<WG5442> of<WG575> covetousness: <WG4124> for<WG3754> a man's<WG5100> life<WG2222> consisteth<WG2076> not<WG3756> in the abundance<WG4052> of<WG1537> the things which he possesseth. <WG5224> <WG846>
And <WG1161> he spake<WG2036> a parable<WG3850> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> The <WG3588> ground<WG5561> of a certain<WG5100> rich<WG4145> man<WG444> brought forth plentifully: <WG2164>

And <WG2532> he thought<WG1260> within<WG1722> himself,<WG1438> saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> shall I do,<WG4160> because<WG3754> I have<WG2192> no<WG3756> room where<WG4226> to bestow<WG4863> my<WG3450> fruits? <WG2590>

And <WG2532> he said,<WG2036> This<WG5124> will I do: <WG4160> I will pull down<WG2507> my<WG3450> barns,<WG596> and<WG2532> build<WG3618> greater;<WG3187> and<WG2532> there<WG1563> will I bestow<WG4863> all<WG3956> my<WG3450> fruits<WG1081> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> goods. <WG18>

And <WG2532> I will say<WG2046> to my<WG3450> soul,<WG5590> Soul,<WG5590> thou hast<WG2192> much<WG4183> goods<WG18> laid up<WG2749> for<WG1519> many<WG4183> years;<WG2094> take thine ease,<WG373> eat,<WG5315> drink,<WG4095> and be merry. <WG2165>

But <WG1161> God<WG2316> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Thou fool,<WG878> this<WG5026> night<WG3571> thy<WG4675> soul<WG5590> shall be required<WG523> of<WG575> thee: <WG4675> then<WG1161> whose<WG5101> shall those things<WG3739> be,<WG2071> which thou hast provided? <WG2090>
So <WG3779> is he<WG3588> that layeth up treasure<WG2343> for himself,<WG1438> and<WG2532> is not rich <WG4147> <WG3361> toward <WG1519> God. <WG2316>

And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101> Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> Take no thought <WG3309> <WG3361> for your<WG5216> life,<WG5590> what<WG5101> ye shall eat;<WG5315> neither<WG3366> for the<WG3588> body,<WG4983> what<WG5101> ye shall put on. <WG1746>
The <WG3588> life<WG5590> is<WG2076> more<WG4119> than meat,<WG5160> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> body<WG4983> is more than raiment. <WG1742>

Consider <WG2657> the<WG3588> ravens: <WG2876> for<WG3754> they neither<WG3756> sow<WG4687> nor<WG3761> reap;<WG2325> which<WG3739> neither<WG3756> have<WG2076> storehouse<WG5009> nor<WG3761> barn;<WG596> and<WG2532> God<WG2316> feedeth<WG5142> them: <WG846> how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> are ye better <WG1308> <WG5210> than the<WG3588> fowls? <WG4071>
And <WG1161> which<WG5101> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> with taking thought<WG3309> can<WG1410> add<WG4369> to<WG1909> his<WG848> stature<WG2244> one<WG1520> cubit? <WG4083>
If <WG1487> ye then<WG3767> be not able <WG1410> <WG3777> to do that thing which is least,<WG1646> why<WG5101> take ye thought<WG3309> for<WG4012> the<WG3588> rest? <WG3062>

Consider <WG2657> the<WG3588> lilies<WG2918> how<WG4459> they grow: <WG837> they toil<WG2872> not,<WG3756> they spin<WG3514> not;<WG3761> and<WG1161> yet I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> that Solomon<WG4672> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> his<WG848> glory<WG1391> was not<WG3761> arrayed<WG4016> like<WG5613> one<WG1520> of these. <WG5130>

<WG1161> If <WG1487> then God<WG2316> so<WG3779> clothe<WG294> the<WG3588> grass,<WG5528> which is<WG5607> today<WG4594> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> field,<WG68> and<WG2532> tomorrow<WG839> is cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the oven;<WG2823> how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> will he clothe you,<WG5209> O ye of little faith? <WG3640>
And <WG2532> seek<WG2212> not<WG3361> ye<WG5210> what<WG5101> ye shall eat,<WG5315> or<WG2228> what<WG5101> ye shall drink,<WG4095> neither <WG2532> <WG3361> be ye of doubtful mind. <WG3349>

For <WG1063> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> do the<WG3588> nations<WG1484> of the<WG3588> world<WG2889> seek after: <WG1934> and<WG1161> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> knoweth<WG1492> that<WG3754> ye have need<WG5535> of these things. <WG5130>
But <WG4133> rather seek<WG2212> ye the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God;<WG2316> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> shall be added<WG4369> unto you. <WG5213>
Fear <WG5399> not,<WG3361> little<WG3398> flock;<WG4168> for<WG3754> it is your Father's good pleasure <WG2106> <WG5216> <WG3962> to give<WG1325> you<WG5213> the<WG3588> kingdom. <WG932>

Sell <WG4453> that ye have, <WG5216> <WG5224> and <WG2532> give<WG1325> alms;<WG1654> provide<WG4160> yourselves<WG1438> bags<WG905> which wax not old, <WG3822> <WG3361> a treasure<WG2344> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> heavens<WG3772> that faileth not,<WG413> where<WG3699> no<WG3756> thief<WG2812> approacheth,<WG1448> neither<WG3761> moth<WG4597> corrupteth. <WG1311>
For <WG1063> where<WG3699> your<WG5216> treasure<WG2344> is,<WG2076> there<WG1563> will your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> be<WG2071> also. <WG2532>
Let your<WG5216> loins<WG3751> be<WG2077> girded about,<WG4024> and<WG2532> your lights<WG3088> burning; <WG2545>

And <WG2532> ye yourselves<WG5210> like unto<WG3664> men<WG444> that wait for<WG4327> their<WG1438> lord,<WG2962> when<WG4219> he will return<WG360> from<WG1537> the<WG3588> wedding;<WG1062> that<WG2443> when he cometh<WG2064> and<WG2532> knocketh,<WG2925> they may open<WG455> unto him<WG846> immediately. <WG2112>

Blessed <WG3107> are those<WG1565> servants,<WG1401> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> lord<WG2962> when he cometh<WG2064> shall find<WG2147> watching: <WG1127> verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> that<WG3754> he shall gird<WG4024> himself, and<WG2532> make them<WG846> to sit down to meat,<WG347> and<WG2532> will come forth<WG3928> and serve<WG1247> them. <WG846>

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> he shall come<WG2064> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> watch,<WG5438> or<WG2532> come<WG2064> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> watch,<WG5438> and<WG2532> find<WG2147> them so,<WG3779> blessed<WG3107> are<WG1526> those<WG1565> servants. <WG1401>

And <WG1161> this<WG5124> know,<WG1097> that<WG3754> if<WG1487> the<WG3588> goodman of the house<WG3617> had known<WG1492> what<WG4169> hour<WG5610> the<WG3588> thief<WG2812> would come,<WG2064> he would have watched, <WG1127> <WG302> and <WG2532> not<WG3756> have suffered <WG863> <WG302> his <WG848> house<WG3624> to be broken through. <WG1358>
Be <WG1096> ye<WG5210> therefore<WG3767> ready<WG2092> also: <WG2532> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> cometh<WG2064> at<WG3739> an hour<WG5610> when ye think<WG1380> not. <WG3756>
Then <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> speakest<WG3004> thou this<WG5026> parable<WG3850> unto<WG4314> us,<WG2248> or<WG2228> even<WG2532> to<WG4314> all?<WG3956>

And <WG1161> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> said,<WG2036> Who <WG5101> then<WG686> is<WG2076> that faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> wise<WG5429> steward,<WG3623> whom<WG3739> his lord<WG2962> shall make ruler<WG2525> over<WG1909> his<WG848> household,<WG2322> to give<WG1325> them their portion of meat<WG4620> in<WG1722> due season? <WG2540>
Blessed <WG3107> is that<WG1565> servant,<WG1401> whom<WG3739> his<WG846> lord<WG2962> when he cometh<WG2064> shall find<WG2147> so<WG3779> doing. <WG4160>
Of a truth<WG230> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> that<WG3754> he will make him ruler <WG2525> <WG846> over <WG1909> all<WG3956> that he hath. <WG5224> <WG848>

But <WG1161> and if<WG1437> that<WG1565> servant<WG1401> say<WG2036> in<WG1722> his<WG848> heart,<WG2588> My<WG3450> lord<WG2962> delayeth<WG5549> his coming;<WG2064> and<WG2532> shall begin<WG756> to beat<WG5180> the<WG3588> menservants<WG3816> and<WG2532> maidens,<WG3814> and<WG5037> to eat<WG2068> and<WG2532> drink,<WG4095> and<WG2532> to be drunken; <WG3182>

The <WG3588> lord<WG2962> of that<WG1565> servant<WG1401> will come<WG2240> in<WG1722> a day<WG2250> when<WG3739> he looketh not for <WG4328> <WG3756> him, and<WG2532> at<WG1722> an hour<WG5610> when<WG3739> he is not aware, <WG1097> <WG3756> and <WG2532> will cut him in sunder, <WG1371> <WG846> and <WG2532> will appoint<WG5087> him<WG846> his portion<WG3313> with<WG3326> the<WG3588> unbelievers. <WG571>

And <WG1161> that<WG1565> servant,<WG1401> which knew<WG1097> his<WG1438> lord's<WG2962> will,<WG2307> and<WG2532> prepared<WG2090> not<WG3361> himself, neither<WG3366> did<WG4160> according to<WG4314> his<WG846> will,<WG2307> shall be beaten<WG1194> with many<WG4183> stripes.

But <WG1161> he that knew<WG1097> not,<WG3361> and<WG1161> did commit<WG4160> things worthy<WG514> of stripes,<WG4127> shall be beaten<WG1194> with few<WG3641> stripes. For<WG1161> unto whomsoever <WG3956> <WG3739> much <WG4183> is given,<WG1325> of<WG3844> him<WG846> shall be much<WG4183> required: <WG2212> and<WG2532> to whom<WG3739> men have committed<WG3908> much,<WG4183> of him<WG846> they will ask<WG154> the more. <WG4055>
I am come<WG2064> to send<WG906> fire<WG4442> on<WG1519> the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> and<WG2532> what<WG5101> will<WG2309> I, if<WG1487> it be already<WG2235> kindled? <WG381>
But <WG1161> I have<WG2192> a baptism<WG908> to be baptized<WG907> with; and<WG2532> how<WG4459> am I straitened<WG4912> till<WG2193> it<WG3739> be accomplished! <WG5055>
Suppose <WG1380> ye that<WG3754> I am come<WG3854> to give<WG1325> peace<WG1515> on<WG1722> earth?<WG1093> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> Nay;<WG3780> but<WG235> rather<WG2228> division: <WG1267>

For <WG1063> from<WG575> henceforth<WG3568> there shall be<WG2071> five<WG4002> in<WG1722> one<WG1520> house<WG3624> divided,<WG1266> three<WG5140> against<WG1909> two,<WG1417> and<WG2532> two<WG1417> against<WG1909> three. <WG5140>

The father<WG3962> shall be divided<WG1266> against<WG1909> the son,<WG5207> and<WG2532> the son<WG5207> against<WG1909> the father;<WG3962> the mother<WG3384> against<WG1909> the daughter,<WG2364> and<WG2532> the daughter<WG2364> against<WG1909> the mother;<WG3384> the mother in law<WG3994> against<WG1909> her<WG848> daughter in law,<WG3565> and<WG2532> the daughter in law<WG3565> against<WG1909> her<WG848> mother in law. <WG3994>

And <WG1161> he said<WG3004> also<WG2532> to the<WG3588> people,<WG3793> When <WG3752> ye see<WG1492> a cloud<WG3507> rise<WG393> out of<WG575> the west,<WG1424> straightway<WG2112> ye say,<WG3004> There cometh<WG2064> a shower;<WG3655> and<WG2543> so<WG3779> it is. <WG1096>
And <WG2532> when<WG3752> ye see the south wind<WG3558> blow,<WG4154> ye say,<WG3004> There will be<WG2071> heat;<WG2742> and<WG2532> it cometh to pass. <WG1096>

Ye hypocrites,<WG5273> ye can<WG1492> discern<WG1381> the<WG3588> face<WG4383> of the<WG3588> sky<WG3772> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> but<WG1161> how<WG4459> is it that ye do not<WG3756> discern<WG1381> this<WG5126> time? <WG2540>
Yea, and<WG1161> why<WG5101> even<WG2532> of<WG575> yourselves<WG1438> judge<WG2919> ye not<WG3756> what is right? <WG1342>

<WG1161> When <WG5613> thou goest<WG5217> with<WG3326> thine<WG4675> adversary<WG476> to<WG1909> the magistrate,<WG758> as thou art in<WG1722> the<WG3588> way,<WG3598> give<WG1325> diligence<WG2039> that thou mayest be delivered<WG525> from<WG575> him;<WG846> lest<WG3379> he hale<WG2694> thee<WG4571> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> judge,<WG2923> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> judge<WG2923> deliver<WG3860> thee<WG4571> to the<WG3588> officer,<WG4233> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> officer<WG4233> cast<WG906> thee<WG4571> into<WG1519> prison. <WG5438>
I tell<WG3004> thee,<WG4671> thou shalt not<WG3364> depart<WG1831> thence,<WG1564> till <WG2193> <WG3757> thou hast paid<WG591> the<WG3588> very<WG2532> last<WG2078> mite. <WG3016>
